name: Ghost Streets
description:
Your car is broken down in the middle of an abandoned city in the desert. You need to collect 10 petrol cans to get going again. Be careful of the ghosts!


Controls: 

I J K L - Move Around

Spacebar - Shoot

Escape - Go back main menu


Important note:

You need to have the latest .Net 4.0 and XNA 4.0 runtime libraries installed on your system in order to run Ghost Streets.

You can download them from here:

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=20914
